verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be patient, be ready,
Look up, the Lord is near.
Be faithful, be fruitful,
Until the day that He appears.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though all things are shaken
And hearts are filled with fear,
Keep working, keep praying
Until His kingdom is here!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Deep in our hearts there's a cry
As the Spirit and Bride say:
Come, Jesus! Come, take Your white horse
And ride through the heavens, come!
